Papa Noel Nedule bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-egwu egwu na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
A mụrụ ya dị ka Antoine Nedule Monswet n'ọnwa Disemba 25, n'afọ 1940.  N'ihi ụbọchị ọmụmụ Krismas ya, a maara ya dị ka "Papa Noel", a na-akpọkarị ya n'okpuru aha ahụ (na-enweghị "Nedule").
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congo site na 1950s ruo 1980s.
Ọ bụ onye otu mbụ na onye ndu nke otu egwu Kékélé mgbe e hiwere ya n'afọ 2000, ọ bụ ezie na ọrịa gbochiri ya isonyere otu egwu ahụ na ụfọdụ n'ime oge ndekọ na njem ya.
